QuestData.Title: Brother Against Brother
QuestData.Description: Our militia has been nearly wiped out. Only I and these few farmers remain.$b$bThose winged creatures... they took the bodies of our men and... and turned them into walking, undead corpses! With every one of our men they took, they bolstered their own ranks.$b$bIt pains me to admit it, but you will need to fight them too, along with the deathguards and val'kyr. As they did in life, they hunt in packs, so take some of my minutemen with you.
QuestData.RewardText: You fought valiantly, but we're getting nowhere. Every body that falls just fuels their forces.
